name: Neon Air Hockey Play
description:
Neon Air Hockey Play a new style of hockey game. Easy to play, hard to master. Challenge yourself with the computer opponents! Easy to control, 3 difficulty levels to choose, Now challenge yourself with the computer opponents or enjoy this game with friends.
Features:
***** Colorful glow graphics.
***** Smooth and responsive game play.
***** Realistic physics.
***** Great sounds and stunning graphics, particle systems and animations.
***** 3 difficulty levels to choose.
